title: How near are we towards the end of mankind? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, the most possible end would only come when the Sun would have grown so much that the Earth’s temperature would be too much for life to exist. By that time, humans would have already left the Earth. Global warming /Climate change and pollution do remain an issue but these issues WON’T eradicate the entire mankind. Sure, many people might die, but many will also remain. I think that it’s mainly the rich or those who can afford proper housing and standards of living will live in the upcoming generations. Unless a huge asteroid doesn’t impact, mankind won’t decease.
